 2011-00482011-02-03,  ,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActInsurance Companies Act
SubjectRegulations Repealing the Reinsurance (Canadian Companies) Regulations and the Reinsurance (Foreign Companies) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Repealing the REINSURANCE (CANADIAN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS AND THE REINSURANCE (FOREIGN COMPANIES) REGULATIONS, in order to provide the Office of the Superintendant of Financial Institutions (OSFI) with an improved capability to address financial institutionsâ€™ risks through guidance and supervisory tools and to give greater flexibility for industry to structure operations and compete globally.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0013 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
